entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Blowing snow this morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:27 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:27 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
